name: Blind Insight, Inc.
description: Developer of a data insights platform designed for preserving privacy, security, and data sovereignty. The company's platform offers sensitive data without revealing its contents and operates on and shares data for social good, business intelligence, and profit while remaining compliant and secure, enabling businesses to improve their products and services without sacrificing user privacy.
one_liner: Developer of a data insights platform designed for preserving privacy, security, and data sovereignty. The company's platform offers sensitive data without revealing its contents and operates on and shares data for social good, business intelligence, and profit while remaining compliant and secure, enabling businesses to improve their products and services without sacrificing user privacy.

name: Bloxtel, Inc.
description: Operator of a telecommunications software company intended to develop innovative 5G network solutions using blockchain technology and connect users with mobile operators. The company's platform is building tools that help users to improve and maintain their network access points to quality-of-service levels required by operators in the US and around the world, enabling telecom industries to make connectivity accessible and affordable to people.

The company's platform is building tools that help users to improve and maintain their network access points to quality-of-service levels required by operators in the US and around the world, enabling telecom industries to make connectivity accessible and affordable to people.

name: Clout Technologies Inc.
description: Global infrastructure for the next generation of content-driven, creator-led marketing.
one_liner: Global infrastructure for the next generation of content-driven, creator-led marketing.

name: PT Kuliner Poll Indonesia
description: Provider of online catering services intended for daily and eventual meals from white-collar workers working in central business district areas to the modern housewives. The company's serving includes Indonesian, Asian, Western and Japanese dishes with high-quality chefs and prioritizing delicious and hygienic flavors, providing meals that are tasty, clean and affordable for everyone to purchase.

name: FineDine Menu, Inc
description: Developer of a digital menu platform designed to help restaurants, cafés, bars and hotels increase sales and lower operational costs. The company's platform offers an error-free ordering process, promotes items, tracks customer behavior and collects feedbacks, enabling restaurants to minimize customer waiting time and employee costs.
one_liner: Developer of a digital menu platform designed to help restaurants, cafés, bars and hotels increase sales and lower operational costs. The company's platform offers an error-free ordering process, promotes items, tracks customer behavior and collects feedbacks, enabling restaurants to minimize customer waiting time and employee costs.

name: FMH Holding Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a procurement and inventory management platform intended to help restaurants to control purchasing. The company's platform offers features like central kitchen management, integration with accounting and POS, notification via various mediums, and inventory management, enabling clients to easily integrate the entire value chain from the farm to the restaurant.

The company's platform offers features like central kitchen management, integration with accounting and POS, notification via various mediums, and inventory management, enabling clients to easily integrate the entire value chain from the farm to the restaurant.

name: Fox-Tech Technology Co.
description: Developer of a data analytics IoT platform designed to monitor, track and improve the operation of farming, logistics, cold chain and manufacturing businesses. The company's software combines real-time data, easy-to-use applications with secure, low power, and high accuracy sensors of temperature and humidity, helping business owners mitigate crises across the value chain in over 24 countries worldwide.
one_liner: Developer of a data analytics IoT platform designed to monitor, track and improve the operation of farming, logistics, cold chain and manufacturing businesses. The company's software combines real-time data, easy-to-use applications with secure, low power, and high accuracy sensors of temperature and humidity, helping business owners mitigate crises across the value chain in over 24 countries worldwide.

name: Nestrom Inc.
description: Operator of a field service management platform intended to streamline quality control, health, safety, and environmental operations. The company's platform provides a suite of modules for audits, inspections, corrective and preventive actions, maintenance tickets, and recurring checkups, enabling organizations to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of their quality and operations activities.

The company's platform provides a suite of modules for audits, inspections, corrective and preventive actions, maintenance tickets, and recurring checkups, enabling organizations to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of their quality and operations activities.

name: OfficeLuv, Inc.
description: Developer of office management software designed to centralize office ordering through one platform. The company's platform provides supplies, coffee and tea, food and beverage items, tech equipment, and all remote employee needs, enabling companies to save companies time and money through part and full-time office management support.
one_liner: Developer of office management software designed to centralize office ordering through one platform. The company's platform provides supplies, coffee and tea, food and beverage items, tech equipment, and all remote employee needs, enabling companies to save companies time and money through part and full-time office management support.

name: OFI Limited
description: Operator of a managed services firm focused on digital transformation in automation services. The company offers a plethora of services, such as public cloud management, data center services, process automation, and development, and helps customers try new concepts and improve current return on investment to benefit from expertise at competitive pricing, thereby enabling clients to reach their potential through technological solutions that are suitable for their needs.

name: Partender, Inc.
description: Developer of bar inventory management software designed for reducing dead stock and eliminating waste or theft. The company's software reduces the time taken by owners and managers to do bar inventory from hours to minutes by digitizing the archaic paper-pen-clipboard process into a few taps and swipes on smartphones, enabling bar managers to gain deeper insights into the inventory levels of their bars.
one_liner: Developer of bar inventory management software designed for reducing dead stock and eliminating waste or theft. The company's software reduces the time taken by owners and managers to do bar inventory from hours to minutes by digitizing the archaic paper-pen-clipboard process into a few taps and swipes on smartphones, enabling bar managers to gain deeper insights into the inventory levels of their bars.

name: Pipefy, Inc.
description: Developer of a workflow management tool designed to create custom processes and workflows for organizations. The company's platform allows team members to plot out standard, replicable operating procedures that permit to streamlining of multistep processes, enabling businesses to organize, manage and automate all processes in a single platform with multiple features in an efficient manner.
one_liner: Developer of a workflow management tool designed to create custom processes and workflows for organizations. The company's platform allows team members to plot out standard, replicable operating procedures that permit to streamlining of multistep processes, enabling businesses to organize, manage and automate all processes in a single platform with multiple features in an efficient manner.

name: Sakana AI K.K.
description: Operator of an AI-enabled information technology company headquartered in Tokoyo, Japan. The company specializes in developing a generative AI model and software that can generate text, images, code, and multimedia, enabling clients to collaborate on research and development of generative AI.

name: Transcelestial Technologies Pte Ltd
description: Developer of wireless communication infrastructure designed to usher in high-speed connectivity from space. The company's wireless laser communication technology has developed a laser network to transfer and relay data for ground, satellite, and deep-space applications, enabling clients to get robust and speedy network services around the globe.
one_liner: Developer of wireless communication infrastructure designed to usher in high-speed connectivity from space. The company's wireless laser communication technology has developed a laser network to transfer and relay data for ground, satellite, and deep-space applications, enabling clients to get robust and speedy network services around the globe.

name: Goods Platform, Inc.
description: Developer of an online platform for wholesalers to manage online orders. The company provides a platform that enables any wholesaler to manage B2B transactions, inventory and create digital catalogs.
one_liner: Developer of an online platform for wholesalers to manage online orders. The company provides a platform that enables any wholesaler to manage B2B transactions, inventory and create digital catalogs.

name: Salido Inc.
description: Developer of a restaurant operating system platform designed to manage customer data easily. The company's platform is a cloud-based application that offers a point of sale, CRM, advanced reports, labor management and kitchen supply management, enabling restaurant owners to manage and keep track of their data accurately.

name: YAYDOO S.A.P.I. de C.V.
description: Provider of an office management platform designed to connect online retailers with customers. The company's digital concierge marketplace application uses chat bots and personalized interaction tools to manage expenses and accounting, simplify purchase decision and more, enabling customers to find and buy products from online retailers based their individual demand.

name: Silk Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of an on-device artificial intelligence platform designed to make connected products a little more human. The company's on-device artificial intelligence platform develops software products which helps in providing technology and fabrics to connect devices together, enabling hardware manufacturers to easily and quickly offer a new class of intelligent products to their customers.

name: OneKitchen Holding Limited
description: Provider of shared kitchen solutions. The company provides tailored spaces for dark kitchens to operate and allows chefs to launch and sell on delivery platforms within days, allowing chefs and restaurant owners to launch their new restaurant from scratch, fine-tune their menu, optimize their operations and maximize their sales.

name: Tableapp Sdn Bhd
description: Provider of an online table booking application designed to make restaurant reservations quicker and easier. The company's online table booking application assists, reviews and manages reservations all-in-one, enablings users to locate, assess and reserve a table instantly with instant confirmation.

name: Lettuce, Inc.
description: Developer of order management system for small and medium sized businesses. The company develops management system with a mobile sales application enabling user's business to capture, track and process orders anywhere in real time.
one_liner: Developer of order management system for small and medium sized businesses. The company develops management system with a mobile sales application enabling user's business to capture, track and process orders anywhere in real time.

name: CStorePro, Inc.
description: Provider of a cloud-based operations and inventory management software designed to manage back office work. The company's software offers live data to monitor sales, void transactions, void tickets, refunds, no sale and manual ring ups, all in real-time, enabling store owners to protect their data with full safeguards according to industry standards and best practices used by banks and financial institutions and control their stores from anywhere.
